Detailed Description

cvmx_sata_uctl_shim_cfg

This register allows configuration of various shim (UCTL) features.

Fields XS_NCB_OOB_* are captured when there are no outstanding OOB errors indicated in INTSTAT and a new OOB error arrives.

Fields XS_BAD_DMA_* are captured when there are no outstanding DMA errors indicated in INTSTAT and a new DMA error arrives.

Accessible only when SATA_UCTL_CTL[A_CLK_EN].

Reset by IOI reset or SATA_UCTL_CTL[SATA_UCTL_RST].
